snippet.title: Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition — Deluxe Set — Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Learn more: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/nintendo-world-championships-nes-edition-deluxe-set-121051/

The Nintendo World Championships make their triumphant return this summer…in your own home! Put your speedrunning skills to the test in over 150 challenges from across 13 different NES games with the Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition game!

The Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition — Deluxe Set includes a set of five pins, 13 art cards, a physical game card, and a gold-colored replica game pak. The Deluxe Set launches July 18, 2024. Digital pre-orders for the standard edition are available now on Nintendo eShop.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
